short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a 'view' link and 'image dimensions' on hover at images of Google image search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Once GooglePanicImages is enabled, a 'View' button, when hovering the mouse over any image, is displayed on Google Images search. Clicking on 'View' opens the source image directly in a new tab.
